ca.uqac.lif.ecp.statechart

Class Configuration<T extends Event>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.ecp.statechart.Configuration<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of events in the statechart
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Configuration.UpStateNode

    public class Configuration<T extends Event>
extends java.lang.Object
    Serialization of the internal state of a statechart. This includes a pointer to its current (nested) state, and the current value of all its state variables.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hallé
